t01LRHidZ58IbFPim.name: Code of Honor (Winged Folk's)
t01LRHidZ58IbFPim.notes: Reciprocity: Repay favors and injuries in full.  Hospitality: Be as good a guest or host as you can.  Piety: Show reverence to gods and ancestors alike.

features.situation: from rational people exposed to your superstitions
to air move while flying

t_zfA3ZZ81dJIiFen.name: Crippled Wings
t_zfA3ZZ81dJIiFen.notes: Must separately reduce Air Move to Basic Speed (you get full points for this)

features.situation: to all skills that require wings, including all weapon skills used while flying

tNTN_B-f9BNwRJPYG.name: Dancing Kicks
tNTN_B-f9BNwRJPYG.notes: Can default kicking techniques to Aerobatics

features.situation: to dodge while flying
from Winged Folk who see you carry an imrosane
from Winged Folk Brides who see you carry an imrosane
to air move while flying

tIOTv9QAcbVxYSbg3.name: Iron Wings
tIOTv9QAcbVxYSbg3.notes: Can purchase wing DR or wing strikers

features.situation: to all ST or HT rolls to resist injury to wings

trGHUBbMe6yzq-eUx.name: Lame (Crippled Legs)
trGHUBbMe6yzq-eUx.notes: You must reduce your Basic Move to half your Basic Speed (round down)

features.situation: to use any skill that requires the use of your legs, including all Melee Weapon and unarmed combat skills (but not ranged combat skills)

tD0iLoXjeNiBlzhCN.name: Lame (Legless)
tD0iLoXjeNiBlzhCN.notes: You cannot stand, kick, or walk at all and must reduce Basic Move to 0.

features.situation: to use any skill that requires the use of your legs, including all Melee Weapon and unarmed combat skills (but not ranged combat skills)

tLsXiWvw9ukaaWvjR.name: Lame (Missing Legs)
tLsXiWvw9ukaaWvjR.notes: Using crutches or a peg leg, you can stand up and walk slowly. You must reduce Basic Move to 2.

features.situation: to use any skill that requires the use of your legs, including all Melee Weapon and unarmed combat skills (but not ranged combat skills)

tDnCJwrEuK9YAo1Il.name: Lame (Paraplegic)
tDnCJwrEuK9YAo1Il.notes: You cannot stand, kick, or walk at all and must reduce Basic Move to 0.

features.situation: to use any skill that requires the use of your legs, including all Melee Weapon and unarmed combat skills (but not ranged combat skills)

tqZ8-D5HYVvfY6zIW.name: Racial Gifts (Winged Folk)
tqZ8-D5HYVvfY6zIW.notes: Permits Winged Folk enhanced dodge, silence, telescopic vision

tSade91jYLHRu9G_7.name: Silence
tSade91jYLHRu9G_7.notes: Only when unmoving or flying (-20%). Bonuses help only when hearing is the only sense that can be used to detect you.

features.situation: to Stealth when you are perfectly motionless
to Stealth if flying

tKc-laBk67LCdI0jo.name: Social Regard (Revered)
tKc-laBk67LCdI0jo.notes: Seen as holy and good luck to be around

features.situation: from those who hold you in high regard for looking angelic

t84o2DhbkaAuEqXZj.name: Special Excercises
t84o2DhbkaAuEqXZj.notes: Can buy off limitations on Flight

features.situation: from ordinary animals

meoGXESqcqAQNytrN.name: Universal
meoGXESqcqAQNytrN.notes: Reaction modifier applies regardless of race

features.situation: from others who see your looks

tkFoFdA9xV-UehHp7.name: Fit
tkFoFdA9xV-UehHp7.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, or resist poison

tpv3uPJOEAaPwki24.name: Very Fit
tpv3uPJOEAaPwki24.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

tbGHFP-J54BFRL228.name: Indomitable
tbGHFP-J54BFRL228.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

mBFip83QXO3AZfgXE.name: Alternate Benefit
mBFip83QXO3AZfgXE.notes: Bonus to HT rolls to avoid harm from failure of covered skills

features.situation: from explorers and nature lovers
to others' Hearing roll in siturations where you want to be heard over noise
to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury
to skill rolls when working on lengthy tasks, but -3 to notice any important interruption

to8XTygBQhwtMZkvL.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
to8XTygBQhwtMZkvL.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

features.situation: from pious folk
to others on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words
to others on IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

tgsUtpgjz3vSU-1rK.name: Overconfidence
tgsUtpgjz3vSU-1rK.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

twNn6LI6XMQg--qP7.name: Selfish
twNn6LI6XMQg--qP7.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

tlt67I3KNCn0NeW-a.name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
tlt67I3KNCn0NeW-a.notes: You are a member of a minority that the dominant culture around you regards as “barbarians” or “inferior.”

features.situation: from others except your own kind
from others of your own kind in an area, profession, or situation where your minority is especially rare
